alerts.message: CAUTION: Bus changing lanes to right
alerts.explanation: Bus nearby making sudden lane change to the right. Be cautious.

alerts.message: CAUTION: Truck changing lanes to left

alerts.message: CAUTION: Car changing lanes to right
